pages.text: The $(d)Advanced Redstone Interface$() will transmit its own received Redstone signal strength to up to 9 linked blocks.$(br2)Insert $(l:items/location_filter)Location Filters$(/l) into it to link it to those locations.
pages.title: Advanced Redstone Interface

pages.text: Holding a $(l:items/redstone_tool)Redstone Tool$(/l) will draw a line from it to each linked location.
